prompt_text: When the front door opens and it's after sunset, turn on the hallway light for 2 minutes, then turn on the living room light, wait 30 seconds, and send a notification to my phone
automation_yaml:
id: 'door_living_room_notification'
alias: Door Open Living Room Power Notification
description: "When door (garage binary sensor) opens after sunset and living room current > 50 mA, send phone notification after 30 seconds"
mode: single
trigger:
  - platform: state
    entity_id: binary_sensor.garage
    to: 'on'
conditions:
  - condition: sun
    after: sunset
action:
  - delay: '00:00:30'
  - condition: template
    value_template: "{{ states('sensor.living_room_max_current')|float(0) > 50 }}"
  - service: notify.mobile_app_tapps_iphone
    data:
      title: "Door Open - Living Room Active"
      message: "The front door opened after sunset and the Living Room circuit current is above 50 mA (light likely on)."

questions.question_text: Which device did you mean? Device 'light' matches devices in wrong location. You mentioned: living_room, hallway, living
Could you clarify the trigger? Sensor mentioned but not found: door
Could you clarify: Action 'turn' is vague - missing details: off, dim, brighten
